name: Daniel Hines
text: I've been to a couple of other places with a similar style but I must say this one was far superior. I can put as many toppings as I want for the same price?? No compromises here. I had a delicious pizza and the service was excellent. We will definitely be returning.

name: Phil 'The Connector' Herrington
text: Friendly staff, fresh ingredients, great crust (not greasy).  Amzaming overall experience I would highly recommend this place.  You can put as many toppings as you want for just $8 on an 11" pizza, so that is lunch and dinner for this guy üëçüëçüòÅüòÅ

name: Dick Spickelmire
text: Place is great! We had the build your own MOD. You get to pick exactly what you want on your pizza! They have  lots of choices! Then they  cook it in the oven really quickly.  Thin crusted crispy

name: Deonna Mills-Humphress
text: First time here. Totally exceeded my expectations! Pizza was very good. Service was quick, quick quick and they were not stingy with their toppings!  Also, do yourself a favor, when the ask you if you would like a No Name Cake...say YES! They are soooooo good!  Well done :-)  We will be back.

name: Aaron C
text: Awesome place for some pizza, build your own right in front of you. Great price too. Dine in area open.

name: Cam
text: Awesome staff. They know how to take care of customers. The pizza it fantastic as well. If you are looking for a good meal go here. Brick Oven pizza is the best

name: Aubrey Brown
text: One of my favorite pizza places. Always a great experience. Delicious pizzas served by a kind and friendly staff.

name: Barry Bleazard
text: Great pizza! Really enjoyed the food and atmosphere. Staff was great for my lunch today. I will definitely be going back.

name: Greg Kienle
text: I liked the pizza, a little skimpy on the toppings tho. We did take-out so no comment on the dining room.

name: Rebecca Andert
text: Super spectacular wonderful. Wonderful customer service fantastic food new favorite place

name: Seth King
text: Delicious and great value for the price. Unlimited toppings and the hot honey on top is the best!

name: Laura Velvick
text: the staff is very polite.   You can get unlimited pizza toppings for the same price if $7.99!  The kids pizza is $5.97.  They have a balsamic fig sauce that is soon delicious.   The restaurant is clean,  the employees are wearing masks and there is hand sanitizer at the door.

name: Tanner J
text: Great pizza! Will definitely return.

name: Heather Nicole Laird
text: Cannot say enough great things about this Mod Pizza location. It‚Äôs so much more than ‚Äúfast food‚Äù. A few weeks ago, I brought my 3 year old and a few of his friends to celebrate his birthday here. The manager and his staff were fantastic. ‚Ä¶More

text: Staff is awesome pays attention to order details

name: king jray
text: The service was wonderful and so was the pizza. Great attitudes.

name: Amanda Baldwin
text: Friendly service, respectful staff. They are taking covid-19 seriously, and it shows in their service. I love their personal sized pizzas, perfect for a single person looking for great pizza. They're lemonade is addicting.

name: Remained Anonymous
text: The pizza here is amazing! I love the different choices you have

name: Jordan Allen
text: Decent first opinion. If I'm comparing to Blaze Pizza - better topping selection, but the crust and sauce are lacking somewhat. Prices seem comparable.

name: Catcher Whitten
text: The vibes were great and the pizza was better

name: Guts
text: Orders are constantly late here. They are really slow workers üëéüèΩ I have been to the downtown location at least 10-15 times to pick up orders and I have waited NOT ONCE. it's always sitting there waiting every single time. Here? You can ‚Ä¶More

name: Nathan Hladky
text: If you've never been to MOD pizza, you're missing out! Choose everything you want on it and how much toppings with no extra cost. Fresh ingredients put together in front of you like a subway sandwich, then baked in an authentic fired brick oven. Just as good as Idaho pizza, but much less.

name: Mark Shadle
text: The prices are more than fair. The pizza is amazing and cooked in a fired oven. And the lemonade is out of this world! They have won a regular return customer for sure!

name: Nikki Valdez
text:
The meal was amazing üòç

Pizza is delicious, salad was not too bad and the selection of lemonade was ‚Ä¶More

name: Jackie Allred
text: My mother in law told me how great this pizza was and I was so excited to see one in Boise.   MOD pizza did not disappoint.  It was so good, and the staff were friendly and efficient.  I will definitely be going back.

name: Kyra Dean
text: Decided to order Mod Pizza for take out, and this is how my pizza was made. Definitely very disappointed. Toppings were supposed to be on the entire pizza, and it‚Äôs obvious no effort was put into making this. The torn up pieces of Canadian bacon definitely icked me out.

name: derrick urquidi
text: My first time coming here tonight and was very satisfied with my visit,the quality was good and a very generous portion size of salad and toppings. The customer service was also great. This place is much better than blaze Pizza ill definitely be back soon.

name: Lisa Marie
text: We have been loyal customers and wanted to support them during this difficult time. We ordered 2 pizzas. One of us has a dairy and soy allergy so no cheese... we ask for extra toppings. It was so sparse that even if we scooped it all into ‚Ä¶More

name: Maddie Page
text: Really great food and great customer service!! We had the nicest guy help us get the deal we came in for even though there was difficulties with it and then gave us drinks too :)) Best gluten free crust too

name: Matt Loper
text: Okay so lemme start off by saying I‚Äôm a DoorDasher and not just a regular customer. I showed up at 2pm although the pick up time was 2:05pm I gave them some time to get the 1 pizza and cheese sticks ready to go. 15 minutes go by and they ‚Ä¶More

name: Tyler K Fisher
text: Great place. The food and service are always great.

name: Austin Kesler
text: What an amazing Pizza place! Same price no matter how many toppings you get. I put on over 18 toppings and it was still less then 8 bucks for my personal 11inch pizza. It was delicious and the pizza cooked in about 5 mins. Probably my favorite sit down pizza restaurant in the Valley. Great lemonade and service too.

name: kristin lilly
text: Gluten friendly options, great toppings and comfortable atmosphere. The people who work there were very good and so patient with us. We had lots of questions and they went out of their way to answer them for us. Definitely going back some ‚Ä¶More

name: Don Allan
text: Delicious pizza. Add as many toppings as you want at no additional cost for under $8 bucks .pizza ready in 5 minutes.  This is my new favorite  place

name: Grace Karry
text: When I discovered MOD, I forgot about Blaze. This fast casual pizza chain allows for so much more customization and the options are just as interesting!

name: Kyle W
text: Great service and great tasting. The staff really care. Their oven was acting up and accidentally burnt my pizza. It was not to their standard so they restarted without hesitation and apologized profusely. Haven‚Äôt tried it? Do yourself a favor and go!

name: Erica Accordino
text: The staff has high energy, great customer service. You pay one price for the pizza and get to add all the toppings you want, then they bake it in a fire oven right there. Our pizzas were ready in 5 minutes and they were delicious! We will definitely be back.

name: chip cardenas
text: This was my first time at the Boise location  on Milwaukee  and I brought my family there.  I told them how wonderful  the place was and the staff proved it!!    What a great group of people  working  there!!

name: Raven Wolf
text: Love this pizza restaurant. Very fresh ingred. Crisp crust. Build it the way you like it. Very affordable

text: Fast good pizza for less than 10 bucks.  Did I mention unlimited toppings!

name: Leslie Phillips
text: This is not like the MOD pizza in Twin Falls. They do not care about allergies and were not pleasant. Seemed to be very confused when working with gluten free crust. Also, order was to go but they missed that and we had to ask to box it up. If you have an allergy, do not suggest this location.
